Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory545.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Celica', 3: "That's it for today's meeting.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: "If there's nothing else, you may be dismissed. Remember to turn in your follow-up reports!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: '【kuroname】.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Celica waves over to you.'}
{2: 'Is something wrong?', 3: '9', 4: '(Walk over)', 5: '9'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: '"World Folklore Enthusiasts"—do you still remember them?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'I remember last Double Seventh Festival, they teamed up with Pulao in Constellia to host a commercial street event.', 3: '14'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: 'Last year on the Double Seventh Festival, people in Constellia worked together with Pulao, Sophia, and Changyu to set up a commercial street. You were there as well.', 4: '1'}
{2: "I remember now. Yeah, that's true.", 3: '14'}
{2: "So, what's going on with that association?", 3: '15'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: "This year, they're hosting another Double Seventh event in Constellia. It's rumored to be huge, and its branches from all over the world are coming to join in.", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Celica', 3: "They've rented out an entire park for the occasion, dividing it into different sections. Each section features a distinct environment or culture—like Kowloong, the Polar region, or the desert...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: "They're holding a special Double Seventh event in each of these areas, making every zone feel unique.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'It sounds like a lively festival.', 3: '19'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: "The WGAA is on board too, saying it's the perfect chance to observe cultural diversity. They want someone to head over to the festival and gather some info.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Celica explains all this with a knowing smile.'}
{3: "Alright, no need for further explanation—it's pretty clear who they've got in mind."}
{2: 'Still, when it comes to gathering intel, there must be someone more qualified than me, right?', 3: '24', 4: "All right, I'm on it.", 5: '26'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: "We're bringing you in because of your previous collaboration with the World Folklore Enthusiasts.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: "No need to stress. This isn't an official task—just keep a casual record of what you see and hear as you enjoy the festival.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: "Oh, by the way, there's a special souvenir at this year's Double Seventh Festival...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Celica says this as she opens her terminal, which displays a simple yet elegantly crafted wooden keepsake.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Celica', 3: "The WGAA offers a reward for recovering these items. If you find any, I'd appreciate you bringing a few back.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: "There's a card-guessing game where you predict whether the next card will be higher or lower than the one already flipped. Guess right, and you win a prize.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sounds like the same setup as before, huh?', 3: '36', 4: 'I see.', 5: '36'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: "Then I'm counting on you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: 'But most importantly, enjoy the festival. Take your time exploring.', 4: '1'}
